Name: SpaceDweller
About the game: SpaceDweller is a turn based game where you have to fight against the Empire that attacked your sector. Explore various star systems, upgrade your ship and destroy your enemies. Combine modules and satellites in a multitude of ways each with unique abilities to gain an advantage in battle. Features: Procedurally generated enemies and levels. Your enemies can have unique abilities that require special approaches and creative thinking to take down. A wide selection of modules and satellites take you can creatively deploy to help destroy the opposing Empire. A custom-made soundtrack to help fully immerse you within the game. Shoot 'em Up missions. Destroy enemy flagships to dicover the lore. A permadeath function.
